name: cv
description: Multi-format resume builder with variants support

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:formats
scripts.build:formats: npm run build:md && npm run build:html && npm run build:pdf && npm run build:docx
scripts.build:pdf: pandoc dist/resume.md -o dist/resume.pdf --pdf-engine=xelatex --template=templates/resume-template.tex 2>/dev/null || echo 'PDF generation requires LaTeX (xelatex). Skipping...'
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch resume/data.yaml --exec 'npm run build && npm run serve'
